note:
Middle Aged PNW dork. IT Admin. Easily distracted. Slap tag sticker collector. Pun lover. Has some old computers. Enjoys his record collection. Not here to debate, you do you :) Is here to have fun and talk to cool people. I have followed and found a lot of fun indie games here on Mastodon!

he/him. Cis.

I know my website looks like garbage. I made it that way on purpose. I swear.
